divs: Sighting DetailsWe this time were sky watching at Jungle Prada And we witnessed these massive orange orbs that came from no where and at first there were just 2 the A 3rd showed up in the blink of an eye. They hovered, rotated and flew over the area we realized was the first place we saw the child figure and blue orb ( st. Pete beach). This all happened for ruffly 4 minutes till the orbs just dispersed.
